long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Extension very simply replaces the word Trump with Tiny Hands in all web pages.  So reading the news you might see President Tiny Hands feuds with China.  President Tiny Hands says his inauguration crowd was not tiny, it was actually quite big etc. 

Tiny Hands is meant as light humor and cathartic relief for the majority of the US who didn't vote for Tiny Hands. #Resist   

Tiny Hands is a project of PAC LAB.
